data.actual_result: The keybind gets typed in the chatbox (In the case of shift + \`, "~" gets typed in the chat box)
data.expected_result: There is nothing typed in the chat box on the overlay
data.short_description: Opening the overlay with a keybind types the keybind in the chatbox if it corresponds to a letter on the keyboard
data.steps_to_repro: - Bind the overlay to a keybind that will type a character when executed (The default Shift + \` works) - Open the overlay with the keybind
